They\'re just, they\'ll simply

00:54:33.774 --> 00:54:35.240

pretend they never saw it.

00:54:35.240 --> 00:54:36.151

- [Rebecca] That\'s what\'s been happening.

00:54:36.151 --> 00:54:36.984

- And so we have to make sure--

00:54:36.984 --> 00:54:38.213

- [Woman] That\'s what\'s been happening.

00:54:38.213 --> 00:54:40.334

- Okay, but there are

remedies for that, all right?

00:54:40.334 --> 00:54:43.564

If you dig up wetlands, don\'t

you have a remedy for that?

00:54:43.564 --> 00:54:44.397

- Yes, yeah, that\'s what I\'m--

00:54:44.397 --> 00:54:46.040

- Okay, so if you dig up a place

00:54:46.040 --> 00:54:48.250

where there are certain

fish that are protected

00:54:48.250 --> 00:54:50.140

or certain trees that are protected

00:54:50.140 --> 00:54:51.370

don\'t you have a remedy

00:54:51.370 --> 00:54:54.730

and it includes potential

criminal prosecution, right?

00:54:54.730 --> 00:54:58.040

Or potential violation or

withdrawal of your permit.

00:54:58.040 --> 00:55:01.140

There are penalties for

all of this misbehavior.

00:55:01.140 --> 00:55:04.490

Now we don\'t, we want

people to do the right thing

00:55:04.490 --> 00:55:08.743

but when they don\'t, there\'s

a consequence to misbehavior.

00:55:09.670 --> 00:55:13.120

- The fear is that graves

are being encountered

00:55:13.120 --> 00:55:15.160

when homes are being excavated?

00:55:15.160 --> 00:55:16.220

- [Harry] Oh, we know that.

00:55:16.220 --> 00:55:17.060

We absolutely know that.

00:55:17.060 --> 00:55:18.730

- And no one\'s being notified?

00:55:18.730 --> 00:55:19.570

- [Harry] No one\'s being notified.

00:55:19.570 --> 00:55:20.790

- Not even the M.E.

00:55:20.790 --> 00:55:21.960

- [Harry] Not even the M.E.

00:55:21.960 --> 00:55:25.260

- Yeah, so I mean, we have

to enforce that somehow.

00:55:25.260 --> 00:55:26.093

- Yeah.

- Why don\'t we look

00:55:26.093 --> 00:55:27.040

at the laws that are on the books.

00:55:27.040 --> 00:55:28.830

John, what are you finding here?

00:55:28.830 --> 00:55:30.690

- You know, this is total news to me

00:55:30.690 --> 00:55:32.750

so I wanna research this and find out

00:55:32.750 --> 00:55:35.790

what we have here as far as the law goes.

00:55:35.790 --> 00:55:37.310

- Isn\'t it just common sense

00:55:37.310 --> 00:55:38.684

if you dig up bones--

00:55:38.684 --> 00:55:41.110

- How come you didn\'t know this

00:55:41.110 --> 00:55:42.218

before when you first came here?

00:55:42.218 --> 00:55:44.180

- You know too, the Tribal

Council has changed too

00:55:44.180 --> 00:55:46.160

at Shinnecock.

- This has nothing to do

00:55:46.160 --> 00:55:47.280

with the Tribal Council.

00:55:47.280 --> 00:55:49.673

This has absolutely nothing

to do with the Tribal Council.

00:55:49.673 --> 00:55:52.756

(bright flute music)

00:56:03.989 --> 00:56:06.406

(soft music)

00:56:45.210 --> 00:56:47.993

- Pesha, can you go hand

me her belt, please?

00:56:50.870 --> 00:56:52.115

Lace \'em up.

00:56:52.115 --> 00:56:52.948

Give me five, give me 10.

00:56:52.948 --> 00:56:54.324

There we go.

00:56:54.324 --> 00:56:58.783

- Oh, check you out.

- Turn this way, let me see.

00:56:59.845 --> 00:57:01.200

- You coming back with more?

00:57:01.200 --> 00:57:03.146

Chief Little Fox, you\'re

in the same space.

00:57:03.146 --> 00:57:03.979

Okay, hi.

00:57:04.868 --> 00:57:05.868

- Mary-Anne.

00:57:21.890 --> 00:57:24.050

- My grandfather was one of the cofounders

00:57:24.050 --> 00:57:26.280

who began the powwow.

00:57:26.280 --> 00:57:29.810

He had a vision that it was going to

00:57:29.810 --> 00:57:31.735

bring the people together.

00:57:31.735 --> 00:57:35.568

(singing in foreign language)

00:57:47.580 --> 00:57:49.150

- From Nassau County to Suffolk

00:57:49.150 --> 00:57:51.920

where a grim discovery

happened in the Hamptons.

00:57:51.920 --> 00:57:54.730

Human remains found at a construction site

00:57:54.730 --> 00:57:56.097

in Shinnecock Hills.

00:57:56.097 --> 00:57:57.870

Now the remains were taken to the office

00:57:57.870 --> 00:58:00.590

of the Suffolk County Medical Examiner.

00:58:00.590 --> 00:58:03.260

- We became very defensive

when we saw officers

00:58:03.260 --> 00:58:05.580

going down there with shovels and sifters.

00:58:05.580 --> 00:58:07.190

That was very offensive.

00:58:07.190 --> 00:58:08.543

- Yeah, they were

treating it like a crime.

00:58:08.543 --> 00:58:10.360

- They was treating it like a crime scene.

00:58:10.360 --> 00:58:11.650

I didn\'t even wanna pull it out

00:58:11.650 --> 00:58:14.980

because I\'m afraid that

I\'m gonna damage something.

00:58:14.980 --> 00:58:18.950

- I don\'t wanna see it turn

into a long thing that--

00:58:18.950 --> 00:58:19.783

- I\'m sorry.

00:58:19.783 --> 00:58:22.739

- As an archeologically sensitive site

00:58:22.739 --> 00:58:24.850

if it meets CPF, we don\'t know yet.

00:58:24.850 --> 00:58:26.460

- Construction is being halted

00:58:26.460 --> 00:58:28.450

in parts of Southampton this morning.

00:58:28.450 --> 00:58:30.370

The state\'s asking Southampton Town

00:58:30.370 --> 00:58:33.431

to consult with members of

the Shinnecock Indian Nation.

00:58:33.431 --> 00:58:35.848

(soft music)

00:58:37.970 --> 00:58:41.310

- It\'s very hard to

see what the profile is

00:58:41.310 --> 00:58:45.970

because it\'s all different

because it\'s all been disturbed.

00:58:45.970 --> 00:58:48.160

So things are falling

down on top of each other.

00:58:48.160 --> 00:58:52.220

I can\'t get a good look at

what the soil even looks like.

00:58:52.220 --> 00:58:54.510

Charcoal down there

falling out of the wall.

00:58:54.510 --> 00:58:55.499

- [Lance] Yeah, it looks

like it\'s charcoal.

00:58:55.499 --> 00:58:57.390

- Which could have something

to do with the burial.

00:58:57.390 --> 00:58:58.370

- [Lance] Looks like it, looks like--

00:58:58.370 --> 00:59:03.370

- You could probably date,

do carbon-14 on the charcoal.

00:59:03.400 --> 00:59:05.720

Typically you find fresh water, so.

00:59:05.720 --> 00:59:07.330

- It\'s right here.

- It\'s right there.

00:59:07.330 --> 00:59:10.581

- Shinnecock Bay was fresh

water until the hurricane.

00:59:10.581 --> 00:59:13.164

(vociferating)

00:59:14.040 --> 00:59:16.230

- Members of the Shinnecock

Tribe in Southampton

00:59:16.230 --> 00:59:19.220

are fighting to protect the

graves of their ancestors.

00:59:19.220 --> 00:59:21.330

Rebecca Genia tells me she believes

00:59:21.330 --> 00:59:23.560

the remains are likely

three centuries old.

00:59:23.560 --> 00:59:25.790

- The Suffolk County

Homicide kept telling us

00:59:25.790 --> 00:59:28.840

we have to make sure

it\'s not an MS-13 murder.

00:59:28.840 --> 00:59:32.303

So it was kinda like almost

insulting from day one.

00:59:48.155 --> 00:59:50.720

Konstantin, the home owner,

00:59:50.720 --> 00:59:53.970

unearthing this grave, he

did not take very lightly

00:59:53.970 --> 00:59:56.070

and he comes from a country

00:59:56.070 --> 00:59:59.660

where there\'s war torn, mass burials.

00:59:59.660 --> 01:00:04.163

So he was very sensitive to this site.

01:00:07.090 --> 01:00:09.530

We asked the Community Preservation Fund

01:00:09.530 --> 01:00:11.630

to possibly make the offer

01:00:11.630 --> 01:00:12.810

so we can put it back

01:00:12.810 --> 01:00:15.972

as much as a natural

state as we possibly can,

01:00:15.972 --> 01:00:20.013

you know, after all of this destruction.

01:00:35.830 --> 01:00:36.663

- Why is that?

01:00:40.500 --> 01:00:42.820

You guys promised that you

were gonna take care of this

01:00:42.820 --> 01:00:45.010

and now you\'re canceling the meeting.

01:00:45.010 --> 01:00:46.560

You know, he\'s in a bad position.

01:00:46.560 --> 01:00:49.570

Now he\'s having problems with his lender

01:00:49.570 --> 01:00:52.060

\'cause his lender saw this in the paper.

01:00:52.060 --> 01:00:54.630

So, you know, now they

could call the loan on him

01:00:54.630 --> 01:00:57.140

\'cause he hasn\'t started, he stopped.

01:00:57.140 --> 01:00:59.540

You know, I don\'t know

what to do at this point.

01:01:00.640 --> 01:01:01.473

All right, bye.

01:01:03.320 --> 01:01:04.390

The day you were there,

01:01:04.390 --> 01:01:06.850

you heard everything you needed to hear

01:01:06.850 --> 01:01:08.567

when they said \"What,

do you want us to buy

01:01:08.567 --> 01:01:10.410

\"every piece that had bones on it?\"

01:01:10.410 --> 01:01:11.930

I mean, you heard.

01:01:11.930 --> 01:01:13.330

We should\'ve known in the beginning

01:01:13.330 --> 01:01:14.380

where that was going.

01:01:15.330 --> 01:01:18.973

- [Konstantin] Call Becky, I

need their blessing to start.

01:01:22.779 --> 01:01:24.980

- Hey, how are ya?

01:01:24.980 --> 01:01:26.770

They canceled the meeting.

01:01:26.770 --> 01:01:28.490

They don\'t wanna get in a battle right now

01:01:28.490 --> 01:01:31.310

\'cause they know the powwow\'s going on.

01:01:31.310 --> 01:01:32.630

And what they\'re gonna do is

01:01:32.630 --> 01:01:34.210

they\'ll say there\'s not enough money

01:01:34.210 --> 01:01:35.780

or didn\'t appraise high enough

01:01:35.780 --> 01:01:37.650

and they\'re gonna try to throw it

01:01:37.650 --> 01:01:39.960

as Konstantin, the bad builder.

01:01:39.960 --> 01:01:41.520

Meanwhile, he\'s willing to sell

01:01:41.520 --> 01:01:43.653

for exactly what he has into it.

01:01:45.020 --> 01:01:48.760

I mean, it\'s probably half

a million dollars, you know,

01:01:48.760 --> 01:01:52.878

and they\'ve spent billions,

almost, in that fund.

01:01:52.878 --> 01:01:55.810

- [Rebecca] I can feel

it slipping already.

01:01:55.810 --> 01:01:58.650

- I will just take

excavator there tomorrow

01:01:58.650 --> 01:02:01.293

and if it\'s nothing

resolved then we\'ll start.

01:02:01.293 --> 01:02:03.710

(soft music)

01:02:07.980 --> 01:02:09.980

- Their offer is what it is

01:02:09.980 --> 01:02:14.980

and there\'s still $185,000 that

he\'s put into this project.

01:02:17.260 --> 01:02:18.700

Yes.

01:02:18.700 --> 01:02:20.150

That\'s the amount he\'s short.

01:02:22.640 --> 01:02:24.920

You know, we\'re trying to do this.

01:02:24.920 --> 01:02:28.210

I need support from everybody to call him

01:02:28.210 --> 01:02:30.670

and say, look we are

going to raise this money.

01:02:30.670 --> 01:02:32.623

We\'re gonna do this.

01:02:36.490 --> 01:02:39.880

Konstantine wants to come back Tuesday

01:02:39.880 --> 01:02:41.200

and finish his project.

01:02:41.200 --> 01:02:43.300

The worse case scenario,

01:02:43.300 --> 01:02:46.110

let\'s say he\'s allowed

to come back in here

01:02:46.110 --> 01:02:47.190

and he said, okay--

01:02:47.190 --> 01:02:48.370

- I will monitor.

01:02:48.370 --> 01:02:50.611

- Okay.

- I can watch.

01:02:50.611 --> 01:02:51.930

The problem with monitoring

01:02:51.930 --> 01:02:55.240

is the backhoe gets to

it before you can see it.

01:02:55.240 --> 01:02:59.519

So even if you say stop, which they stop,

01:02:59.519 --> 01:03:01.580

things are already disturbed.

01:03:01.580 --> 01:03:02.413

- Right.

01:03:11.032 --> 01:03:11.957

You know, it is an emergency

01:03:11.957 --> 01:03:13.700

and the last text I sent you

01:03:13.700 --> 01:03:15.824

I said why can\'t we purchase the land

01:03:15.824 --> 01:03:18.483

and put in land, into trust.

01:03:19.400 --> 01:03:22.820

It\'s ours, we can own it

and put it into trust.

01:03:22.820 --> 01:03:24.800

- My question is who

will control the land?

01:03:24.800 --> 01:03:25.633

- Us.

01:03:25.633 --> 01:03:28.440

We will draw up a contract where

we\'re stewards of the land.

01:03:28.440 --> 01:03:30.410

They don\'t want another thing to do.

01:03:30.410 --> 01:03:32.760

They\'ve proposed this in the past to us

01:03:32.760 --> 01:03:35.840

and not your board of trustees

but other boards of trustees.

01:03:35.840 --> 01:03:37.210

Please read this, please read this,

01:03:37.210 --> 01:03:38.400

please read this, please.

01:03:38.400 --> 01:03:39.810

A year, two, three.

01:03:39.810 --> 01:03:42.410

Come Tuesday I gotta beg that guy

01:03:42.410 --> 01:03:44.600

to come here instead of going over there

01:03:44.600 --> 01:03:46.940

to start developing to come here

01:03:46.940 --> 01:03:50.139

so he can hear it from

someone else besides me.

01:03:50.139 --> 01:03:50.972

- Okay.

01:03:50.972 --> 01:03:52.442

All right, we gotta find some more money.

01:03:52.442 --> 01:03:53.275

- Yep.

01:03:58.840 --> 01:04:01.950

We\'re trying to get the man all the money.

01:04:01.950 --> 01:04:03.830

He needs all of his money back

01:04:03.830 --> 01:04:06.433

and he deserves to have

all of his money back.

01:04:08.010 --> 01:04:10.640

And that should be no question.

01:04:10.640 --> 01:04:13.870

But it\'s always got to

be the native people

01:04:13.870 --> 01:04:17.225

who stand up and begin something good.

01:04:17.225 --> 01:04:19.080

(baby babbles)

01:04:19.080 --> 01:04:21.497

(soft music)

01:04:30.148 --> 01:04:33.350

(rhythmic drum music)

01:04:33.350 --> 01:04:35.750

- Good afternoon, ladies and gentlemen.

01:04:35.750 --> 01:04:37.310

Once again, thank you all for coming

01:04:37.310 --> 01:04:39.560

to our lands here at Shinnecock.

01:04:39.560 --> 01:04:42.410

Ladies and gentlemen, we

have a situation going on.

01:04:42.410 --> 01:04:43.940

Right down the road from here

01:04:43.940 --> 01:04:46.180

there is a piece of land that the remains

01:04:46.180 --> 01:04:48.400

of one of our ancestors was found.

01:04:48.400 --> 01:04:50.570

The leadership of the

Shinnecock Indian Nation

01:04:50.570 --> 01:04:53.330

feels very strongly

that this piece of land

01:04:53.330 --> 01:04:55.300

should be returned to the tribe.

01:04:55.300 --> 01:04:58.320

We call upon you to stand with us.

01:04:58.320 --> 01:05:00.629

- I\'ll have relatives going around

01:05:00.629 --> 01:05:03.430

passing out flyers with that information

01:05:03.430 --> 01:05:05.149

to see how you can contribute.

01:05:05.149 --> 01:05:09.100

(audience applauding)

01:05:09.100 --> 01:05:10.970

- Members of our Historic Preservation

01:05:10.970 --> 01:05:12.750

and Repatriations Committee

01:05:12.750 --> 01:05:15.040

has been trying to get them

01:05:15.040 --> 01:05:18.800

to put legislation and policy in place

01:05:18.800 --> 01:05:21.800

for incidents just like

this and what transpired.

01:05:21.800 --> 01:05:23.290

So they\'re aware of the long history

01:05:23.290 --> 01:05:25.540

of us going at it with them

01:05:26.670 --> 01:05:31.670

and so, for me, it\'s really

about sticking to your word.

01:05:51.202 --> 01:05:53.730

- We\'re here today to pray.

01:05:53.730 --> 01:05:58.730

So today we are gonna ask that

the ancestors please help us.

01:05:59.160 --> 01:06:03.080

(speaking foreign language)

01:06:03.080 --> 01:06:05.290

- Thank you, Creator, for this land.

01:06:05.290 --> 01:06:07.200

Thank you for our ancestors.

01:06:07.200 --> 01:06:11.010

We pray today, Creator, that

you can be with all of us

01:06:11.010 --> 01:06:12.310

however this goes.

01:06:13.318 --> 01:06:17.320

And I pray that our energy, our ancestors,

01:06:17.320 --> 01:06:21.360

feel strong and they feel

honored and respected.

01:06:24.830 --> 01:06:26.620

I pray that any division

01:06:26.620 --> 01:06:29.137

that our tribes have created

01:06:29.137 --> 01:06:32.950

and this town has and this government has,

01:06:32.950 --> 01:06:35.080

I pray that we can understand, Creator,

01:06:35.080 --> 01:06:38.536

that this is unhealthy for all of us.

01:06:38.536 --> 01:06:40.953

(soft music)

01:07:23.961 --> 01:07:24.794

(gavel banging)

01:07:24.794 --> 01:07:25.720

- [Board Member] Suffolk County Tax map

01:07:25.720 --> 01:07:29.520

number 900-23232 to lot 35.

01:07:29.520 --> 01:07:33.570

- If the town decides to

buy this property today,

01:07:33.570 --> 01:07:37.410

it\'s a very historic

time for our relationship

01:07:37.410 --> 01:07:39.540

between Shinnecock and Southampton.

01:07:39.540 --> 01:07:42.600

- We are concerned about our

house on a private street

01:07:42.600 --> 01:07:46.080

that we do not lose the value of our home.

01:07:46.080 --> 01:07:47.450

- We are doing our best.

01:07:47.450 --> 01:07:49.270

That\'s very difficult sometimes

01:07:49.270 --> 01:07:51.143

when your emotions are struck.

01:07:52.200 --> 01:07:57.200

We hope that we all can uphold our word.

01:07:57.200 --> 01:07:58.860

- Thank you for meeting with us

01:07:58.860 --> 01:08:01.440

when our tribal leadership

has called for meetings.

01:08:01.440 --> 01:08:03.160

You know, this is not going to be

01:08:03.160 --> 01:08:05.460

the last time this happens.

01:08:05.460 --> 01:08:09.660

So I really hope that there are policies

01:08:09.660 --> 01:08:11.170

and protocols put in place

01:08:11.170 --> 01:08:13.270

for the next time.

01:08:13.270 --> 01:08:14.973

- Anyone else on the motion?

01:08:16.032 --> 01:08:16.865

I\'ll call the vote.

01:08:16.865 --> 01:08:17.892

All in favor?

01:08:17.892 --> 01:08:18.950

- [All] I.

01:08:18.950 --> 01:08:21.280

- Any opposed, opposition?

01:08:21.280 --> 01:08:22.819

It is approved.

01:08:22.819 --> 01:08:23.792

(audience applauding)

01:08:23.792 --> 01:08:26.375

(bright music)

01:08:36.810 --> 01:08:37.786

- So clearly a win.

01:08:37.786 --> 01:08:40.990

- More to come, more to come.

01:08:40.990 --> 01:08:43.090

- We will acquire this property.

01:08:43.090 --> 01:08:46.730

It will be protected and

it\'s not gonna stop here.

01:08:46.730 --> 01:08:51.730

So I felt a sense of like we

had almost turned a corner,

01:08:52.610 --> 01:08:55.193

that this was part of a healing process.

01:08:56.410 --> 01:08:59.120

- No more accidental unearthing.

01:08:59.120 --> 01:09:01.500

There\'s no such thing.

01:09:01.500 --> 01:09:03.681

I\'d do a jig but my legs hurt.

01:09:03.681 --> 01:09:05.764

(laughs)

01:09:08.420 --> 01:09:09.880

Our goal is to purchase

01:09:09.880 --> 01:09:12.930

every single vacant lot in the hills

01:09:12.930 --> 01:09:15.343

and protect for all time.

01:09:17.228 --> 01:09:20.145

- Talk to you soon.

- See you later.

01:09:23.458 --> 01:09:25.375

- We\'ll be at the fire.

01:09:28.880 --> 01:09:30.410

- [Rebecca] When people realize

01:09:30.410 --> 01:09:32.810

you take care of your ancestors,

01:09:32.810 --> 01:09:34.580

you take care of the earth,

01:09:34.580 --> 01:09:36.600

good things will happen.

01:09:36.600 --> 01:09:39.103

That\'s what I believe

with my heart and soul.

01:09:48.730 --> 01:09:51.570

- [Corey] Looking at the history

of the Shinnecock struggle,

01:09:51.570 --> 01:09:54.630

it\'s their struggle that gives us a sense

01:09:54.630 --> 01:09:56.540

of what the future might look like.

01:09:56.540 --> 01:09:58.860

That it\'s their continued desire

01:09:58.860 --> 01:10:00.900

for dignity, for recognition,

01:10:00.900 --> 01:10:04.810

and for, not even a return of

the land to their ownership,

01:10:04.810 --> 01:10:08.040

but a return of the land to

the spirit of their history.

01:10:08.040 --> 01:10:10.080

A collective ownership of collaboration

01:10:10.080 --> 01:10:12.320

of human survival and subsistence

01:10:12.320 --> 01:10:14.480

in a sustainable way with nature

01:10:14.480 --> 01:10:16.070

that really is the vision

01:10:16.070 --> 01:10:18.070
